channel.title: How could i make an auto player saver?
channel.description:
Hey guys ,
I want to make an autoplayer saver for my server. so I mean it saves the players of the game every 60 seconds as example.
Thank you for your time

item.title: How could i make an auto player saver?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Distryct, post:3, topic:540487”][quote author=Pure_ link=topic=659347.msg4409516#msg4409516 date=1393094649]
You can schedule a new task with your task manager to do this every 60 seconds, e.g.

[code=java]TaskManager.schedule(new Task(60000) {

@Override
public void run() {
PlayerHandler.savePlayers();
}
}[/code]

edit: If you don’t have one try implementing this one.
[/quote]
I dont have task manager class and the thread is deleted[/quote]My bad, try this one.

Read full topic
item.source: How could i make an auto player saver?
